sentence.Network_en: One of the most popular is a story about Orpheus and Eurydice.
sentence.Network_cn: 其中最广为流传的便是奥菲斯与尤丽黛丝的故事.

sentence.Network_en: Hades was so touched by the music that he decided to let Eurydice go.
sentence.Network_cn: 黑德斯由于受到音乐的感动,于是决定释放尤丽黛丝.

sentence.Network_en: Eurydice disappeared in a cloud of smoke as soon as he looked back.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一向后看,尤丽黛丝就消失在一团烟雾之中.
